name: Baobab Suite
tag_list: mobile-apps, ios, android, google-app, digital-media, ipad, software, marketplace
description: Specialised Mobile Backend as a Service
overview:
Baobab Suite is a product brought to you by afrozaar.com. Baobab Suite is a solution that provides all the necessary mobile app backend services required to ensure a secure and consistent user experience when it comes to the distribution and consumption of media content across mobile app platforms.

The Baobab Suite platform has been built in collaboration with a number of media and newspaper publishing houses, who have contributed towards the products strengths by sharing their main challenges faced in the mobile space. Some of the challenges faced are around the commercialisation, metering of content and the freedom and flexibility to experiment with mobile techniques. It is with great satisfaction and excitement that we are now ready to share this first of it’s kind Mobile Backend as a Service (MBaaS) for publishers, with a newspaper specific workflow process that meets the high frequency and sustainability performance objectives of some of the most prominent London-based publishers.
